name: Reactions
description: The Reactions component is a custom React component for displaying and selecting emoji reactions.

properties.name: availableReactions
properties.label: Available Reactions
properties.settingTooltip: All available reactions to display in the picker.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify all available reactions to display in the picker.

properties.name: perLine
properties.label: Emojis Per Line
properties.settingTooltip: The number of emojis to show per line.

properties.name: emojiSize
properties.label: Emoji Size
properties.settingTooltip: The size of the emojis (inside the buttons) in px.

properties.name: emojiButtonSize
properties.label: Emoji Button Size
properties.settingTooltip: The size of the emoji buttons in px.

properties.name: emojiButtonRadius
properties.label: Emoji Button Radius
properties.settingTooltip: The radius of the emoji buttons.

properties.name: emojiButtonColors
properties.label: Emoji Button Colors
properties.settingTooltip: An array of color that affects the hover background color.

properties.name: initialReactions
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify an initial array of selected reactions.

properties.name: initialReactionsByUser
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify an initial array of selected reactions by user.

properties.name: userReactionsCount
properties.label: User Reactions Count
properties.settingTooltip: Counter of the maximum number of possible selected emotions for the user (0 for an unlimited number).

eventHandlers.name: onEmojiSelect
eventHandlers.label: On Emoji Select
